summary:
The nords would have you beleive that they are the only ones fighting for their home-land, their birthright. But do not be deceived the Reachmen have been fighting for theirs for even longer.

Fixed racial stats in order to be compatible with Requiem.


Based on friendly-lore mod http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5
descriptionHtml:
Based on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52373/?]Madmen of the Reach-Forsworn Faction [/url]
Special thanks to [b]Naitsirhc[/b] for this awsome mod



Requires
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem Roleplay Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70998/?]Forsworn Race 1.2  

[/url]

[color=#ffd966]Introducing the Forsworn Race[/color]

[color=#ffd966]-They are part breton, part nord, so natrually they have the abilities of both.

[color=#a64d79][color=#ffd966][color=#cc4125]UPDATE version 1.2

Changes: Removed Dragonskin, smithing +5.[/color]
[/color]
[/color]

-Passives
25% resistant to frost.
15% resistant to magic.

-Skills
One-handed +10
Archery +5
Destruction +10
Sneak +5
Alchemy +5
Light Armor +5


[b]Fixed racial stats in order to be compatible with Requiem.

105 Health
105 Stamina
90 Magicka
0,2 Health Regen
1,15 Magicka Regen
1,65 Stamina Regen
[/b]

Load Order

Forsworn Race
Requiem
Requiem-Forsworn
Requiem-Req

Run Skypatch of requiem after installation

Enjoy![/color]
author: Vrennos
